  1. Foster Name: Mary
  2. Foster Family: Eva Ottis
  3. Location of Family: Humphrey, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1909-03-03, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1930-07-09, Humphrey, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Notes: Suffered a long illness from which she never recovered; died at 21.
